item.title: Download the latest Hashicorp Terraform, Packer, and Vault bits
item.description: I created a PowerShell Script that downloads the latest version of Terraform, Packer, and Vault, extracts the archives to binaries, and adds the folder of the path environment variable. Running this script ensures you always work with the latest versions of Terraform, Packer, and Vault. <# .DESCRIPTION Function to download and extract the latest Packer, Terraform and Vault version from Hashicorp .NOTES Author: Ivo Beerens .NOTES Site: www.ivobeerens.nl .NOTES Version: 1.
